pages.text: With writing a Routing book, you first need a need to get a Book and Quill. Note: You can have fill a book with multiple pages of routing, only the active page will affect the routing.

The rules of formatting include: $(li) All Pages must start with `ROUTING {` and end with '}'$() $(li) Methods also have { on the same line as the name, and each each input starting on their own line. $() $(li)String variables should being and end with quotes$()
